scripts.local-install: npm ci && npm install --save decompress-cli && curl -O https://pagina-simx72-aba9b.web.app/zip/asteroids-assets-latest.zip && fse mkdirp asteroids-assets && ./node_modules/.bin/decompress asteroids-assets-latest.zip --out-dir=asteroids-assets && fse remove asteroids-assets-latest.zip && npm uninstall --save decompress-cli
scripts.start:
echo "  Aplicaci√≥n iniciada
